sources.title: Pollyanna
sources.description: This one was the one starring Mary Pickford. It is rather good for a silent movie

metadata.Plot: A little girl comes to a town that is embattled by feuds and intimidated by her aunt. By the time she must leave, she has transformed the community with her indominatable will to see the good side of even the worst situations and bring it out for the betterment of all.
metadata.Actors: Jane Wyman, Hayley Mills, Richard Egan
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Award2 wins & 1 nomination total
